title: 28 ungraded P-F with Wallace, Willis, Tenney, Chase
author: dougscats

posts.post_title: 28 ungraded P-F with Wallace, Willis, Tenney, Chase
posts.post_content:
Page 1: 13 P-F, with Wallace, Willis, Tenney, and Chase--$263--
   Notes: Maddox has a small spot of paper-loss above belt. 
             The dog-eared Willis has a miscut back, the right border 
             showing the ends of a second Piedmont logo.  
             Quillen looks miscut on bottom and has "419" pencilled on the back.

Page 2: SOLD!--15 commons, mostly Poor--$205--
   Notes: Gasper has two small pinholes, top and bottom.
             No obvious creases on the bottom row of five. 

If you want an individual card/cards, let me know and I'll give you a price. 
I'll give priority to the full page sale today; I'll break it up starting tomorrow, reserving cards as of now.  First taker gets it. 

Most forms of payment okay. If paypal, pay as friend; thanks.

I am always looking to upgrade [Good or better], so if you're interested in trading please send me a list of what you have. I prefer ungraded cards.

No pm's, please. Email [url]djdoremus@msn.com[/url], or post here. 

*Note on Scans: As the page is turned, the backs are in reverse order. Also, the cards are in two protective plastics, a halved penny-sleeve--which creates the appearance of a vertical line on each card--and a pocket-page:
